title: President signs OGRA, Allied health professionals bills into Acts
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 1 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi on Tuesday signed into Acts the bills relating to Oil and Gas Regulatory Authority (OGRA) and Allied Health Professional Council.
These include OGRA (Amendment) Act 2022, OGRA (Second Amendment) Act 2022, and Allied health Professionals Council Act 2022.
According to Presidentâ€™s media office, the president gave approval to three bills in line with Article 75 of the Constitution which became Act.
